name: Double Bluff
overview: Double Bluff is a 1999 dice gambling game for one player. Development is attributed to Knees Calhoon and published in Loadstar #181. Double Bluff is a bit of fluff, this very simple betting game has some new cards and a small challenge to it. The dealer, draws a card randomly from a 52-card deck and bets you either $1 or $5 that it's a face card (J,Q,K) and you either fold, bet or double the bet. The card is flipped and if it is a face card you pay double what was bet, if not a face card you get paid double.
